Momoshiki first calls forth several lightning bolts to strike the ground before him, then releases a powerful tidal wave of water over the area, forming a large, electrified whirlpool.

* [[Scientific Ninja Tool: Orca and Powerful Breath]]

[[pl:Yakusaikazuchinokami]]
== Trivia ==
* '''[[Wikipedia:Yakusanoikazuchi|Yakusanoikazuchi]]''' or '''Ikazuchi''' is a collective name for the eight kami of thunder in Japanese mythology. Each kami represents a different type of storm.
